required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Breast Cancer Self-Management Mobile Care Application Intervention in the Quality of Life
clinical_study.official_title: The Evaluation of Intelligence Breast Cancer Self-Management Mobile Care Application Intervention in the Quality of Life for Newly Diagnosed Non-metastatic Breast Cancer Women: Randomized Controlled Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study was to investigate the quality of life (QoL) for women with breast cancer in Taiwan after using the BCSMS App.

detailed_description.textblock: After receiving their first diagnosis of breast cancer, women with stage 0 to III were randomized into intervention and control groups. Intervention group subjects used BCSMS App and the control group subjects received usual care. Two questionnaires: EORTC QLQ-C30 and EORTC QLQ-BR 23 were distributed to subjects in both arms at baseline and at 1.5 and 3 months. All evaluations were anonymous.

primary_outcome.description: Baseline Taiwan Chinese version of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life -Core 30 (version 3). The minimum and maximum values are 0 and 100, and higher scores mean a better outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of EORTC QLQ-C30 at 1.5 month
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Taiwan Chinese version of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life -Core 30 (version 3) to 1.5 month.The minimum and maximum values are 0 and 100, and higher scores mean a better outcome.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of EORTC QLQ-C30 at 3 month
primary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Taiwan Chinese version of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life -Core 30 (version 3) to the 3rd month. The minimum and maximum values are 0 and 100, and higher scores mean a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.description: Baseline Taiwan Chinese version of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life -Breast 23 (version 3). The minimum and maximum values are 0 and 100, and higher scores mean a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of EORTC QLQ-BR23 at 1.5 month
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Taiwan Chinese version of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life -Breast 23 (version 3) to 1.5 month. The minimum and maximum values are 0 and 100, and higher scores mean a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of EORTC QLQ-BR23 at 3 month
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline Taiwan Chinese version of the European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life -Breast 23 (version 3) to the 3rd month. The minimum and maximum values are 0 and 100, and higher scores mean a better outcome.

arm_group.description: Experimental group with BCSMS App using
Control group without BCSMS App using

intervention.description: Breast Cancer Using a Self-Management Support mHealth Application

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- first diagnosis of breast cancer with stage 0 to III in past year.
- aged 20 to 65 years
- had an Android/iOS smartphone;
- able to read and write in Chinese;
- willing to participate in the study and provide informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- not matched to inclusion criteria
- mental illness
- serious illness and life-threatening
